com.cognifide.slice.api.injector

Interface InjectorWithContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InjectorWithContextImpl

    @ProviderType
public interface InjectorWithContext
extends Closeable
    Decoration for Guice Injector class with simple access to modyfing and restoring ContextProvider. This decoration has three delegate getInstance() methods added for convenience.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Easy to remember alias for the #popContextProvider() method.
      com.google.inject.Injector getInjector()
      Return Guice Injector behind this InjectorWithContext.
      <T> T getInstance(Class<T> clazz)
      Return new instance of given class using Guice Injector.
      Object getInstance(com.google.inject.Key<?> key)
      Return new instance by given key using Guice Injector.
      Object getInstance(String className)
      Creates an object of the given class.
      ContextProvider popContextProvider()
      Pop top ContextProvider from ContextProvider stack and set previous one as current on Guice Injector.
      void pushContextProvider(ContextProvider contextProvider)
      Push new ContextProvider on ContextProvider stack and set it as current on Guice Injector.
